articles.title: Build a Basic Bookcase
articles.description: High-end furniture projects are great to dream about.
articles.materialsNeeded:
* 1/2 x 3/4 inch parting strip
* 1 x 2 common pine
* 1 x 4 common pine
* 1 x 10 common pine
* 1/4 inch thick lauan plywood
* Finishing Nails
* Sandpaper
* Wood Glue
* Wood Filler
* Minwax Oil Based Polyurethane

articles.title: Learn How to Program
articles.description: In this course, you'll learn how to write code like a pro!
articles.materialsNeeded:
* Notebook computer running Mac OS X or Windows
* Text editor

articles.title: Learn How to Test Programs
articles.description: In this course, you'll learn how to test programs.
